comments: Hayes (DET) establishes his right foot as his pivot and maintains it as he starts his dribble.
Washington (CHA) is in the paint for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Hayes (DET) avoids stepping out of bounds while still in possession of the ball.
Plumlee (CHA) establishes himself in Hayes' (DET) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Hayes (DET) initiates contact with Rozier's (CHA) right arm, which affects his driving shot attempt.
Hayes (DET) goes to, not through, Ball's (CHA) space and marginal contact occurs as Hayes releases away during the drive.
Hayes (DET) brings his off-arm toward Ball (CHA) and marginal contact occurs as Hayes releases away without applying any force.
Duren (DET) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Bogdanovic (DET) and Oubre Jr. (CHA) engage and disengage and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
Ball (CHA) wraps his hand around the opposite side of Bogdanovic's (DET) body and the contact affects his FOM as he reaches for the pass.
Stewart (DET) and Plumlee (CHA) mutually engage and disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Ball (CHA) initiates contact with Bogdanovic's (DET) right arm, which affects his driving shot attempt.
Ivey (DET) moves slightly forward but the contact with Ball (CHA) is marginal during the drive.
Ball (CHA) avoids stepping out of bounds while still in possession of the ball.
Stewart (DET) maintains verticality and absorbs the contact that occurs at the end of Rozier's (CHA) drive.
Duren (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Stewart (DET) grabs and pulls Plumlee's (CHA) jersey, which affects his FOM during the rebound.
Bogdanovic (DET) is already in Rozier's (CHA) path and incidental foot to foot contact occurs as Rozier moves under the pick.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) makes clean contact with the ball prior to incidental arm contact occurring thereafter with Ivey (DET) during the drive.
Washington (CHA) and Stewart (DET) mutually engage and disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Ball (CHA) initiates contact with Duren's (DET) right arm, which affects his play at the basket.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) establishes his left foot as his pivot and maintains it as he starts his dribble.
Duren (DET) brushes Plumlee's (CHA) arm and marginal contact occurs during Plumlee's (CHA) shot attempt near the rim.
Stewart (DET) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Hayes (DET) gives a step of distance when establishing himself in Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs during the screen.
Knox II (DET) avoids making body contact with Rozier (CHA) as he contests the jump shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (DET) establishes himself in McDaniels' (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Duren (DET) makes contact with the ball prior to incidental arm contact with Oubre Jr. (CHA) that follows during the his driving shot attempt.
Plumlee (CHA) reaches at the ball and marginal arm to arm contact occurs with Stewart (DET).
Duren (DET) establishes himself in Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Washington (CHA) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.
Duren (DET) does not give a step of distance when establishing himself in McDaniels' (CHA) path and illegal contact occurs with McDaniels during the pick.
Burks (DET) cleanly blocks the ball OOB during Rozier's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) brings his off-arm toward Duren (DET) during his driving shot attempt and marginal contact occurs as Duren blocks the ball OOB.
Rozier (CHA) lifts and replants his left pivot foot at the start of his dribble.
Rozier (CHA) overtly extends his right leg out but avoids making contact with Burks (DET) during the jump shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Burks (DET).
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Hayes (DET).
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Bogdanovic (DET).
Washington (CHA) and Stewart (DET) engage and disengage off-ball during the in-bound play.
